boardgame.name: Star Wars in my Pocket
Zombie in my Pocket
Zumbi no meu Bolso
boardgame.description: There are two versions of Zombie in my Pocket, go to Zombie in my Pocket for the 1-8 player Cambridge Games Factory version._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Zombie in my Pocket is a print-and-play game solo game (see the files section below). The game is free, fits in your pocket, and the modular board combined with the development cards make it a different game every time._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In Zombie in my Pocket, you're searching for the secret of the evil temple where you can find the item to destroy the zombies rising from the dead. You can pick up items to bash zombies along the way; a machete, golf club, chain saw, or even your former uncle's grisly femur._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Find the zombie totem, then bury it in the backyard graveyard before midnight and you've saved the world. Otherwise, you're zombie food._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Zombie in my Pocket (PnP) by Jeremiah Lee is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. Share, re-theme then share, gift, re-make, but don't sell or make non-paper versions without asking._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2009 Golden Geek Best Print _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Play Board Game Nominee
2010 Golden Geek Best Print _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Play Board Game Nominee
2010 Golden Geek Best Print _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Play Board Game Winner
boardgame.boardgameversion: English Zombie House Blitz Kickstarter edition
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: OBG All Alone 1: Erik talks about solitaire gaming

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Color on 110# cardstock, with cardbacks and tilebacks. Color rulebook and tuckbox. Includes a small d6 in the tuckbox. This is the solo game, with the newest artwork. Printed and cut by a professional printer. (email for pictures, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll put one up soon)

Shipping is $1.50 to the US, $2.00 to Canada, $2.50 to UK, $3 to Australia don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t know to others, but I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m willing to ship there.

Color on 110# cardstock, with cardbacks and tilebacks. Color rulebook and tuckbox. This is the solo game, with the newest artwork. Printed and cut by a professional printer. Shipping is $1.50 to the US, $2.00 to Canada, $2.50 to UK, $3 to Australia don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t know to others, but I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m willing to ship there.

This is the Print and Play Edition. I have printed out the game on 110 pound card stock in Color (not the backs) on a Ink-Jet. Then on some nice glossy paper I printed the rules in Black and White on a Laser-Jet. The game has been constructed (cut out and rules folded). In short, this set is ready to play when you get it. Here_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s what you are getting: http://www.boardgamegeek.com/image/392165 Shipping Costs: If you are in the US, shipping will be FREE! International Buyers will pay $2. Other Notes: I will accept paypal or GeekGold (50 GG) or check or cash. Also, I can sleeve the cards in some clear plastic sleeves (no cost) if you want. Feel Free to Make an Offer.
*Reserved*
